verses.name: 1 Chronicles 17:20
verses.text: O Lord, there is none like thee, neither is there any God beside thee, according to all that we have heard with our ears.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 17:21
verses.text: And what one nation in the earth is like thy people Israel, whom God went to redeem to be his own people, to make thee a name of greatness and terribleness, by driving out nations from before thy people, whom thou hast redeemed out of Egypt?

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 17:22
verses.text: For thy people Israel didst thou make thine own people for ever; and thou, Lord, becamest their God.
